standard_footer_includes.description: Renders the HubSpot tracking code and any other code included in your Footer HTML in Content Settings or the options of a particular page. This tag should be inserted directly before the closing body tag.

standard_header_includes.description: Adds jQuery, layout.css, any attached stylesheets, a meta viewport tag, Google Analytics tracking code, other page meta information, and code added to the head tag at the domain/template/page level. This variable should be added to the <head> of HTML templates.
